tool_description: "Famous Quotes" API is a user-friendly REST API designed for the API marketplace, offering access to thousands of famous quotes and the personalities behind them. Developers can seamlessly integrate this API into their applications with two key endpoints. The first endpoint, `/api/v1/quotes/{name}`, allows developers to retrieve quotes based on the name of the person who made them. The second endpoint, `/api/v1/category/{category}`, enables users to fetch quotes based on different categories....
name: Famous Quotes
title: Famous Quotes

api_list.name: Get Categories
api_list.description: Get a list of all quote categories available. Use following endpoint : /api/v1/categories
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://famous-quotes10.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/categories"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "famous-quotes10.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Quotes by Quotee(Name)
api_list.description: Generates a list of quotes by the person who said it. Example, enter "Julius Caesar" for {name} here : /api/v1/quotes/{name}.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://famous-quotes10.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/quotes/Julius Caesar"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "famous-quotes10.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Quotes by Category
api_list.description: Returns a list of Quotes by category. Example,  enter "Humor" for {category}  on the endpoint : /api/v1/category/{category}
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://famous-quotes10.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/category/humor"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "famous-quotes10.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
